titles: The sphere of Marcus Manilius made an English poem with annotations and an astronomical appendix / by Edward Sherburne, Esquire.
author: Manilius, Marcus.
Sherburne, Edward, Sir, 1618-1702.
notes: Translation of the first book of: Astronomicon.
